item.title: RTX
item.description: score:173 Chances: RTX has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. 2024 could be a better year for this aerospace and defense company if the analyst’s projections hold true.
